scriptLines:
query: 'SELECT
     P.Sort_ID as PROJECT_ID,
    LM.LEVEL_MAP_ID AS LEVEL_ID,
    P.PROJECT_IDENTIFIER ,
     SM.SBU_MAP_ID AS SBU_ID,
    WT.TOWER,
    WT.[LEVEL],
    WT.FLAT,
    'Wet Area' as Sclicer,
     WT.ACTIVITY_ID,
    CASE 
        WHEN WT.VALUE IN ('','NA') THEN '0%'
        ELSE WT.VALUE
    END AS VALUE,
    WT.TYPE_OF_WORK,
    WT.CATEGORY,
     WT.UPLOAD_DATE
FROM
     (SELECT
          WR.UPLOAD_TIME AS UPLOAD_DATE,
          WR.PROJECT_ID,
          WR.TOWER,
          WR.[LEVEL],
          WR.FLAT,
          COLUMN_NAME.*,
          WM.ACTIVITY_ID,
          WM.SBU_ID,
          WM.CATEGORY,
          DENSE_RANK () OVER (PARTITION BY  PROJECT_ID ORDER BY Convert(Date,UPLOAD_TIME) DESC)   AS  DRANK
     FROM [STG].[O_PLN_WETAREA_RAW_STG] WR
     CROSS APPLY (
                                SELECT  [Plastering_Clearance_with_1_Mtr_Marking],'PLASTERING CLEARANCE WITH 1 MTR MARKING'
                    UNION ALL SELECT  [Wet_Area_Tile_Marking],'WET AREA TILE MARKING'
                    UNION ALL SELECT  [MEP_Marking],'MEP MARKING'
                    UNION ALL SELECT  [Wet_Area_Cutting_And_Chasing],'WET AREA CUTTING & CHASING'
                    UNION ALL SELECT  [Pex_pipe_installation],'PEX PIPE INSTALLATION'
                    UNION ALL SELECT  [Re_packing_of_MEP_Services],'RE PACKING OF MEP SERVICES'
                    UNION ALL SELECT  [MEP_Pipe_installation_Borepacking],'MEP PIPE INSTALLATION - BOREPACKING'
                    UNION ALL SELECT  [Wet_Area_Bore_Packing],'WET AREA BORE PACKING'
                    UNION ALL SELECT  [Cistern_installation],'CISTERN INSTALLATION'
                    UNION ALL SELECT  [Drywall_framing],'DRYWALL FRAMING'
                    UNION ALL SELECT  [Pex_Elbow_Connections],'PEX ELBOW & CONNECTIONS'
                    UNION ALL SELECT  [Bottom_Boarding_Clearance],'BOTTOM BOARDING CLEARANCE'
                    UNION ALL SELECT  [Bottom_boarding] ,'BOTTOM BOARDING'
                    UNION ALL SELECT  [Under_Screed_Waterproofing],'UNDER SCREED WATERPROOFING'
                    UNION ALL SELECT  [Wet_Area_Screed],'WET AREA SCREED'
                    UNION ALL SELECT  [Ledge_Wall_Full_Board_Closure_Clearance],'LEDGE WALL FULL BOARD CLOSURE CLEARANCE'
                    UNION ALL SELECT  [MEP_HL_Water_Supply_Drainage],'MEP HL WATER SUPPLY & DRAINAGE '
                    UNION ALL SELECT  [MEP_HL_Ducting_FCU_Works],'MEP HL DUCTING & FCU WORKS '
                    UNION ALL SELECT  [MEP_HL_Electrical_Services_Installation],'MEP HL ELECTRICAL SERVICES INSTALLATION'
                    UNION ALL SELECT  [MEP_HL_Works_Testing],'MEP HL WORKS & TESTING'
                    UNION ALL SELECT  [MEP_HL_Packing_Clearance],'MEP HL PACKING CLEARANCE'
                    UNION ALL SELECT  [Packing_for_all_builders_work_opening],'PACKING FOR ALL BUILDERS WORK OPENING '
                    UNION ALL SELECT  [Wet_Area_MEP_H_L_Fire_Sealent_Framing_Clearance],'WET AREA MEP H/L FIRE SEALENT & FRAMING CLEARANCE '
                    UNION ALL SELECT  [Wet_area_Wall_Tile],'WET AREA WALL TILE'
                    UNION ALL SELECT  [Wet_Area_FC_Framing],'WET AREA FC FRAMING'
                    UNION ALL SELECT  [Wet_Area_MEP_H_L_Boarding_Clearance],'WET AREA MEP H/L BOARDING CLEARANCE'
                    UNION ALL SELECT  [FC_Boarding_Joint_Taping],'FC BOARDING & JOINT TAPING'
                    UNION ALL SELECT  [Ceiling_Paint_Primer],'CEILING PAINT PRIMER'
                    UNION ALL SELECT  [Ceiling_Paint_Stucco_1st_Coat_2nd_Coat],'CEILING PAINT STUCCO 1ST COAT & 2ND COAT'
                    UNION ALL SELECT  [Wet_Area_Ceiling_First_Coat_Paint],'WET AREA CEILING FIRST COAT PAINT'
                    UNION ALL SELECT  [MEP_Grill_Diffuser_Installtion],'MEP GRILL & DIFFUSER INSTALLTION '
                    UNION ALL SELECT  [Shower_Threshold],'SHOWER THRESHOLD'
                    UNION ALL SELECT  [Linear_Drain_Supply],'LINEAR DRAIN SUPPLY'
                    UNION ALL SELECT  [Linear_Drain_Fixing],'LINEAR DRAIN FIXING '
                    UNION ALL SELECT  [Under_Tile_Waterproofing],'UNDER TILE WATERPROOFING'
                    UNION ALL SELECT  [Bathroom_Door_Threshold],'BATHROOM DOOR THRESHOLD'
                    UNION ALL SELECT  [Wet_Area_Floor_Tile],'WET AREA FLOOR TILE'
                    UNION ALL SELECT  [Wall_tile_bottom_Tile],'WALL TILE BOTTOM TILE'
                    UNION ALL SELECT  [Grouting_Wall_Floor],'GROUTING - WALL & FLOOR'
                    UNION ALL SELECT  [Silicone_Wall_Floor_Corners],'SILICONE - WALL & FLOOR CORNERS'
                    UNION ALL SELECT  [Shower_Partition_U_channel],'SHOWER PARTITION - U CHANNEL'
                    UNION ALL SELECT  [Shower_Partition_Glass],'SHOWER PARTITION - GLASS'
                    UNION ALL SELECT  [Accessories_Silicon],'ACCESSORIES & SILICON'
                    UNION ALL SELECT  [Bathroom_Door_Frame_Installation],'BATHROOM DOOR - FRAME INSTALLATION'
                    UNION ALL SELECT  [Bathroom_Door_Architrave_Installation],'BATHROOM DOOR - ARCHITRAVE INSTALLATION'
                    UNION ALL SELECT  [Bathroom_Door_Shutter_Installation],'BATHROOM DOOR - SHUTTER INSTALLATION'
                    UNION ALL SELECT  [Bathroom_Door_Ironmongery_Installation],'BATHROOM DOOR - IRONMONGERY INSTALLATION'
                    UNION ALL SELECT  [Vanity_Cabinet],'VANITY CABINET'
                    UNION ALL SELECT  [Vanity_Cabinet_Counter_top],'VANITY CABINET COUNTER TOP'
                    UNION ALL SELECT  [MEP_Final_Fixtures_Sanitary_CP_fittings_Lights_WB],'MEP FINAL FIXTURES (SANITARY ,CP FITTINGS & LIGHTS,WB)'
                    UNION ALL SELECT  [MEP_Ledge_Wall_Clearance],'MEP LEDGE WALL CLEARANCE '
                    UNION ALL SELECT  [Ledge_Wall_Closing],'LEDGE WALL CLOSING'
                    UNION ALL SELECT  [Silicone_around_MEP_Fixtures],'SILICONE AROUND MEP FIXTURES'
                    UNION ALL SELECT  [Wet_Area_Final_Coat_paint],'WET AREA FINAL COAT PAINT'
               )AS COLUMN_NAME(VALUE,TYPE_OF_WORK)
     INNER JOIN     [STG].[O_PLN_WETAREA_MAP_STG] WM
          ON          COLUMN_NAME.TYPE_OF_WORK = WM.ACTIVITY_SEQUENCE
     WHERE          VALUE IS NOT NULL) WT
LEFT JOIN [DWH].[PLN_LEVEL_MAP_ALL_DIM] AS LM
     ON          WT.[LEVEL] = LM.[LEVEL]
LEFT JOIN  [DWH].[PROJECTS_NEW_DIM] P
      ON          WT.PROJECT_ID=P.PROJECT_IDENTIFIER 
LEFT JOIN [DWH].[PLN_SBU_MAPPING_DIM] SM
     ON          WT.SBU_ID=SM.SBU_IDENTIFIER
WHERE          WT.DRANK = 1',
